protein.specific_function: Key enzyme in heme biosynthesis. Catalyzes the oxidative decarboxylation of propionic acid side chains of rings A and B of coproporphyrinogen III.

go_class.description: oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors
oxidoreductase activity, acting on the ch-ch group of donors, oxygen as acceptor
